name: Marguerite
effect: [On Play] Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {Amazon Lily} or {Kuja Pirates} type card and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order and trash 1 card from your hand.
trigger: [Trigger] If your Leader has the {Kuja Pirates} type, play this card.
